column5: Hey folks,I'll be heading to Elk Lake in Northern Ontario in mid July this year. Never fished the lake before, we will be targeting some walleye,bass,pike and whitefish. Anyone fished this lake before, if so any tips/advice on where/how to fish the lake?Thanks a bunchGary
Gary when you say Elk Lake where exactly in northern Ont. are you refering to? If it is in Ne Ont. just west of New Liskeard I may be able to point out a couple of spots for you.Dave[email protected]
